sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react" import { Row, Col,Image,ListGroup, Button, ListGroupItem , Card} from "react-bootstrap" import { useBootstrapBreakpoints } from "react-bootstrap/esm/ThemeProvider" import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom" import '../Products/productDetail.css' import Products from "../Products/product" import { Rating } from "@mui/material" const ProductDetail = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) console.log(product.stock) const{id} = useParams() useEffect(() => { try { async function getProductFromApi(){ const res = await fetch (`http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/product/`) const repos = await res.json() setProduct(repos) } getProductFromApi() } catch(error){ console.error(error)}; }, [] ) return(
Retour

{product.title}

{product.price}

{product.description}

 Status:

{product.stock > 0 ? 'En Stock' : 'Epuisé'}
) } export default ProductDetail
